list_1.li_0: CONTENT COVERED IN THE SIMULATION INCLUDES
list_1.li_1: The process of placing RFID tags on pipes
list_1.li_2: Transportation of the pipes from the warehouse to the drill operation area

title_4: 3D SIMULATION OF DRILLING OPERATIONS WITH RFID TAGGED PIPES:
paragraph_5: Juego Studios has developed a 3D Simulation Training for employees on drilling operations with RFID tagged pipes. The training module features virtual simulation of the industrial environment with 3D representations of equipment and tools. With a 3D simulated environment of the drilling site, the training solution provides instructions and walkthrough of the fitting of the RFID tagged pipes and the actual drilling operations.

list_2.li_0: Advantages of Using Simulated Training Modules:
list_2.li_1: Can allow users to practice handling complex machines and carrying out intensive procedures
list_2.li_3: Easy tracking and monitoring of performances
list_2.li_4: Creation of reports and suggestion of improvements
